info.title: Automation Actions V4
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: You want to empower other users in your account to automate specialized parts of their day-to-day processes (e.g., creating highly customized quotes based on the data from an enrolled contact and their associations).
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the automation API to define custom actions in the HubSpot workflows tool, which allows users in your account to integrate with external services as they build out a HubSpot workflow.
